title: "Our Little Secret"
content:
Michael Bierut [reviews the documentary film “Helvetica”](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007162016/http:/www.designobserver.com/archives/023897.html) before it shows at New York’s AIGA and talks about how type was set back in the days before personal computers made it available to everyone.

 [‹ Searching for freestylisch set typo in books](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007162016/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33075 "Go to previous forum topic") [Birthday Wishes Granted ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007162016/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32566 "Go to next forum topic")
